content: and 20 join with a new colour in any double_crochet ch2 this counts as the first double_crochet double_crochet into each st join to the top of the beginning chain-2 with a slip_stitch 72 double_crochet rounds 21 - 25 turn the beanie so that you are now working on the inside wrong side ch2 this counts as the first double_crochet double_crochet into each st join to the top of the beginning chain-2 with a slip_stitch 72 double_crochet weave in the ends and turn beanie so that you are back on the outside right side then turn up the cuff from row 21 enjoy your mandala beanie
